text:
< Hero , Heroine , random girl with ash at a coffee shop>
, hero arrives lately > 
Hero : hello everyone
Heroine: btw , Tinu na frnd , Sneha
<shake hands>
Girl : Ippativarkau mee gurinche cheptundhi . asalu ela start aindhi eppudu kalisaru , evaru first propose chesaru…(blinks the eye_brows).?
Aman : in mind (cheppindhi annav kadha)
Heroine : tane prepose chesadu..
Girl : Eppudu kaalisaru ?, what’s the magical date?
Heroine : cheppu..
< Hero is actually laid his hand on the table , now he straightens his back and looks at the girl and aman and nods the head>
Aman : *in mind : Ee details anni telusukoni jathakalu chusatadha enti , book aipoinattu unnade..
Heroine : (with a litte intense )- gurthuleda?
Aman : Ikkada….(lags a bit) aquarium lo rangu  rangula chepalu untayi, telusa 
Heroine : Aman .. please 
Hero : in mind* : Rangu rangula chepala?,.. rangulu , rangulu ante holi.
           Ala antav enti , Actual ga aithe holi roju chusa, kani matladindhi next day kadha, ay roju chepdama ani…
Girl : Oh sweet..!
Heroine : sorryyyyy..Marchipoyav annukunna
Hero : Marchipovadama...Aina adhi ela marchipotha cheppu  
Aman : lifts his head..
<Attharintiki dareddhi climax music (hand hold)>
Sneha : You know Long distance relationships general ga workout avvavu, But nuvvu oppukunnavu ante .. great asalu. Maya U.S lo nuvvu ikkada , kastam kadha..
< Showing everyones’s face>
Hero : Naku Enduku cheppaledhu ..
Maya : Arjun.. adhi.. chepdam anukunnanu..
Aman : Shit(slowly).. Flight……(raises his eyes)
Maya: inko 2 days lo….
< Arjun leaves from there…Aman still sits , Maya follows hero>
